name: BattleMages
description:
Year is 2030, a great disaster hit the world when a meteor striked the earth due to an unknown reason which peoples couldn't predict or prepare for it. The world was destroyed. But few survived, only thanks to this incident a strange development occurred to the human body, as enhancing one's senses and most importantly, some of the population that lasted after this blast have the capability now to use magic and develop it, a power we only heard about in books and fairy tales...

unfortunately, those gifted humans now are used for political purposes, after years of conflicts between states, and they have to fight for their countries, and to do that, each year there will be a surviving competition to chose the ones who can really defend their countries.
